text: haey trong chea anak del ban bangkeut aoy mean samoutr daembi aoy puok anak ban ttuoltean pi vea nouv sach srasa haey puok anak achy k chenhpi vea nouv krueng loma daembi peak vea haey anak ka meulkheunh saampow andet now leu vea ning daembi aoy puok anak svengork nouv sechakdei braosa bratan pi trong . haey sangkhumtha puok anak nung doengkoun(champoh a l laoh)
